result.markdown:
# Taxiing time {#sec-taxiing-time}



::: {.cell}

:::



## EUROCONTROL recommended value

@tbl-taxi-time shows the mean duration, in minutes, of taxi times at airports,
based on flights in ECAC area.



::: {#tbl-taxi-time .cell tbl-cap='Average taxi time duration'}
::: {.cell-output-display}
\setlength{\LTpost}{0mm}
\begin{longtable}{lrrrrrr}
\toprule
 & \multicolumn{2}{c}{All airports} & \multicolumn{2}{c}{Large to very large airports\textsuperscript{\textit{1}}} & \multicolumn{2}{c}{Medium to small airports\textsuperscript{\textit{2}}} \\ 
\cmidrule(lr){2-3} \cmidrule(lr){4-5} \cmidrule(lr){6-7}
Year & Taxi-in & Taxi-out & Taxi-in & Taxi-out & Taxi-in & Taxi-out \\ 
\midrule
2015 & 5.9 & 12.5 & 6.8 & 14.2 & 5.1 & 11.0 \\ 
2016 & 6.0 & 12.8 & 6.8 & 14.6 & 5.2 & 11.3 \\ 
2017 & 6.1 & 12.9 & 6.8 & 14.4 & 5.5 & 11.8 \\ 
2018 & 6.2 & 13.8 & 6.8 & 14.9 & 5.6 & 12.1 \\ 
2019 & 6.2 & 13.4 & 7.1 & 15.2 & 5.4 & 11.7 \\ 
2020 & 5.7 & 11.4 & 6.8 & 13.2 & 4.5 & 9.6 \\ 
2021 & 5.7 & 11.7 & 6.8 & 13.3 & 4.7 & 10.1 \\ 
2022 & 6.0 & 12.3 & 7.2 & 14.1 & 4.8 & 10.5 \\ 
\bottomrule
\end{longtable}
\begin{minipage}{\linewidth}
\textsuperscript{\textit{1}}Large to very large airports: >150,000 movements\\
\textsuperscript{\textit{2}}Medium to small airports: 149,999 to 15,000 movements\\
\emph{Source: EUROCONTROL Central Office for Delay Analysis (CODA)}\\
\end{minipage}
:::
:::



Data in @tbl-taxi-time is based on actual data from CODA. The taxi-out time is 
defined as the time spent by a flight between its actual off-block time (AOBT) 
and actual take-off time (ATOT). The taxi-in time is defined as the time spent
between its actual landing time (ALDT) and actual in-block time (AIBT). The 
taxi-in and taxi-out durations are calculated on the basis of data sent 
by airlines to CODA.

@tbl-taxi-time-additional shows the average additional taxi out time per departure in top 
30 airports in terms of movements, excluding Turkish airports.[@ectrlprr2022]



::: {#tbl-taxi-time-additional .cell tbl-cap='Average additional taxi time per departure'}
::: {.cell-output-display}
\setlength{\LTpost}{0mm}
\begin{longtable}{lrrrrrrr}
\toprule
Year & 2015 & 2016 & 2017 & 2018 & 2019 & 2020 & 2021 \\ 
\midrule
Minutes & 3.7 & 3.91 & 3.85 & 4.21 & 4.22 & 2.16 & 2.1 \\ 
\bottomrule
\end{longtable}
\begin{minipage}{\linewidth}
\emph{Source: \href{https://www.eurocontrol.int/publication/performance-review-report-prr-2021}{EUROCONTROL (2022) Performance Review Report (PRR 2021)}}\\
\end{minipage}
:::
:::



Values in @tbl-taxi-time-additional are based on actual data from airports. The 
additional taxi-out time is a proxy for the average departure runway queuing 
time on the outbound traffic flow during congestion periods at airports. It is 
the difference between the actual taxi-out time of a flight and a statistically 
determined unimpeded taxi-out time^[The unimpeded taxi-out time is the taxi-out time in non-congested conditions at airports]
based on taxi-out times in periods of low traffic demand. There is one 
unimpeded time per stand runway combination at each airport.

## Other possible sources

*EUROCONTROL CODA Taxi times - Summer and Winter reports* [@taxi:time] show, by airport, seasonal taxi time statistics for the IATA 
winter season and the IATA summer season:

* Taxi-in times

* Taxi-out times

* Taxi-out times by wake turbulence category

These taxi times are calculated using the airline reported actual off-block time,
actual take-off time, actual landing time and actual in-block time, providing 
the aviation community with seasonal benchmark values.

Furthermore for additional granularity, taxi-out times by wake turbulence 
category are also offered for a number of airports.
